title: I installed a new input method but cannot use it. Why?
answer:
[On the home screen, touch Settings > Language & input. Select the new input method you installed and touch Default. Choose the new input method from the input method list. ]() 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110607) ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110608)
